pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, March 28, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, March 28, 2017:

Gananoque, Ontario 

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Thousand Islands National Park.

302 Thousand Islands Parkway
Gananoque, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Open coverage for arrival and departure.
  • Pooled photo opportunity only for tour of trail.
